name: lululemon First Responder Discount
description: 15% off athletic wear for first responders and healthcare workers
fullDescription: lululemon offers first responders and healthcare workers a 15% discount on online and in-store purchases with verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- 15% off online and in-store purchases
- Applies to athletic wear, yoga gear, accessories
- Available on full-price and sale items
- Valid for police, fire, EMS, nurses
- Year-round discount
howToGetIt:
1. Online: Visit lululemon.com and verify at checkout
2. In-store: Show valid work ID or badge
3. Eligible: law enforcement, firefighters, EMTs, nurses
4. Healthcare workers also qualify
5. Discount applied at point of sale
